result.title: Ingersoll Rand Acquires Transvac Systems Ltd., Expanding Capabilities in Ejector Technology and Sustainable Engineered Solutions
result.text: DAVIDSON, N.C., Nov. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ingersoll Rand Inc., (NYSE: IR) a global provider of mission-critical flow creation and life science and industrial solutions, today announced the acquisition of Transvac Systems Ltd. (Transvac), a United Kingdom-based global supplier of ejector solutions and sustainable process technologies used to move, mix, and compress fluids and gases. Transvac will join the Industrial Technologies and Services (IT&S) segment.

result.title: Ingersoll Rand: The Price Isn't Right
result.text: Ingersoll Rand continues to deliver strong revenue and cash flow growth, driven by acquisitions and higher pricing, despite declining profitability. IR's Industrial Technologies and Services segment faces organic volume declines, while Precision and Science Technologies posts robust revenue and profit gains. Management remains optimistic, raising guidance for 2025 with expected EBITDA of $2.10$2.16 billion and ongoing acquisition activity fueling further growth.
